meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>few</kanji> who <kanji>help</kanji> are the <vocabulary>major</vocabulary>s or <vocabulary>lieutenant commander</vocabulary>s. They are the few who step up to the plate to help out in the army, according to this word's kanji.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
